p: The high-resolution crystal structure of angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) was obtained from PDB (PDB_ID:2AJF) ( Fig. 2). The two active sites of the protein are centered on the active amino acid site of the original ligand in the crystal structure. The active site 1 of 15.262085, âˆ’17.780927, 57.786474 with the points count of 4198 ( Fig. 3 ) and the active site 2 of 21.539614,7.755639,61.035558 with the points count of 4198 ( Fig. 4 ) were constructed to dock.
